metadata.title: USN-5493-2 -- Linux kernel (HWE) vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the 8 Devices USB2CAN interface implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly handle certain error conditions, leading to a double-free. A local attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5493-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-hwe-5.13-headers-5.13.0-52 - 5.13.0-52.59~20.04.1 linux-buildinfo-5.13.0-52-lowlatency - 5.13.0-52.59~20.04.1 linux-image-5.13.0-52-generic-64k -
